defaultDraw(Graphics2D, Rectangle2D, Color, boolean) - Method in class dungeon.model.items.mobs.Mob
Draws the mob as a simple filled circle If the mob is not at full health, a health bar will be drawn below it If the mob is not at full energy, an energy bar will be drawn above it

T

tick() - Method in class dungeon.model.Game
Advances the game by one round
Each round has the following stages: Each map tile is informed about the new round Each treasure item is informed about the new round For each creature in turn, and then for the hero: The tile they are standing on is informed of this fact They are prompted to act Dead creatures are removed from the game
